resources.string: Do you wish to save before continuing?
Which orientation would you like for your painting?
Angus Paint Â© 2021\n Angus Software\n Developed by Harry Cliff

Paint your own masterpiece!
 -Use your finger as your painting tool
 -Press the save button to save your painting to your device
 -Press the load button to paint upon a picture from your device
 -Press the new button to start a new masterpiece
 -Upon starting a new painting, you can change your painting's orientation
 -Press the palette button to change your brush size or color
 -Have fun, and please rate on Google Play!
